title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 4406 - The Conduct Of Off-track Betting
content:

State Regulations
§ 4406.1 - Denial of telephone betting account
§ 4406.2 - Minimum payoff
§ 4406.3 - Posting of entries
§ 4406.4 - Calculation of separate pools
§ 4406.5 - Presentation for payment
§ 4406.6 - Sale, exchange of tickets

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 4406

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 104 [1], [19], 128; L. 1940, ch. 254, § 118 as
amd. by L. 1973, ch. 346, § 4; L. 1973, ch. 414, §
5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
